resources.string:
I'm Izildo mobile developer from Rotterdam. 

 I love daily coding and studying Japanese. 

\ the kind of apps I like to build are games and business apps. 

 I hope that one day I can work as a mobile developer, 
 and my dream finally would be a work as a game programmer. 

 freelancing and traveling around Japan would be the ideal lifestyle. 

 I'm eager to learn, action taker, love games and love the Japanese culture. 

 I hope that one day I can open my own game studio. 
 I look up to people that are good engineers and have something to share.
